summary: Provides a test suite for the PNDM diffusion pipeline, including lightweight unit tests with a mock UNet to check basic inference functionality and integration tests that run the pipeline on the CIFAR‑10 dataset to assess end‑to‑end image generation quality.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and performance of the PNDM diffusion pipeline for image generation, enabling early detection of regressions and confirming that the model meets quality standards before deployment.
